jd: From: Ashish Kumar, 3B Staffing LLC ashish.kumar@3bstaffing.com Reply to: ashish.kumar@3bstaffing.com Local to MN with DL copy onlyLocation: Richfield, MN - LOCAL TO MN ONLY **MUST HAVE A LINKEDIN THAT MATCHES THE RESUME WITH A PHOTO*** Hybrid * This is a hybrid role. 2-3 days in Richfield office* 5-7 years of experience in developing Micro-services and J2EE applications using Java 8, Java 11, Java 17, Groovy, Spring Boot and Spring JPA.* Configure and develop a Java Rest service that producer/consumes messages from Apache Kafka.* Using Docker Container to dockerize Java applications and spin up services locally.* Expertise in using the development IDE's like Intellij.* Experience in using build tools like Maven and Gradle.* Knowledge in writing Test Cases with JUnit and Spock, logging using Log4J and SL4J.* Experience in testing code quality using SonarQube/Checkmarx.* Testing web services using Postman.* Implementing Caching mechanisms like EHCache, Redis or Memcached.* Comfortable with UNIX commands as we use PUTTY for installations and configurations in dev environments* Skilled in Oracle and Cassandra.* Experience in using version control tool like GitHub.* Experience in setting up pipelines using Github actions.Project Description:We are part of the Fulfillment, Availability, and Button State team. Fulfillment Services is responsible for providing the following information across the Best Buy site.• Shipping - shipping date(s) and shipping price(s) for an SKU or order.• Delivery and installation- delivery /installation dates and delivery/installation price(s) for appliance(s) about an SKU or order.• In-store services - dates/timeslots for in-store services about different locations. For example, remote starter installation (BOSS).• Pickup - pickup dates for all Best Buy locations and alternate pick locations within a 250-mile radius about an SKU/order• Button State/Button view - provides all the button states across the Best Buy sitePosition Summary/Job Description:The role will be to pe• 5-7 years of experience in developing Micro-services and J2EE applications using Java 8, Java 11, Java 17, Groovy, Spring Boot and Spring JPA.• Configure and develop a Java Rest service that producer/consumes messages from Apache Kafka.• Using Docker Container to dockerize Java applications and spin up services locally.• Expertise in using the development IDE's like Intellij/Eclipse.• Experience in using build tools like Maven and Gradle.• Knowledge in writing Test Cases with JUnit and Spock, logging using Log4J and SL4J.• Experience in testing code quality using SonarQube/Checkmarx.• Testing web services using Postman.• Implementing Caching mechanisms like EHCache, Redis or Memcached.• Comfortable with UNIX commands as we use PUTTY for installations and configurations in dev environments• Skilled in Oracle and Cassandra.• Experience in using version control tool like GitHub.• Experience in setting up pipelines using Github actions.Skills Overview:What are the top five skills and number of years of experience required to perform this job?We are seeking a Level 4 developer with a minimum of 5-7 years of experience. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in Spring, Java, REST services, Kafka, writing test cases, and implementing caching. Experience with Cassandra is essential, as well as the ability to understand memory leaks and debug production incidents. Prioritizing performance is crucial in development.What are some preferred/nice-to-have skills the manager is looking for?Below are some nice to have skills- Adapt to any new technology- Continuous integration using GitHub actions- Have experience in GCP Functions Thanks & RegardsAshish KumarSenior technical recruiterDirect- 973-532-27653B Staffing LLCEmail: ashish.kumar@3bstaffing.comOne Gateway Center, STE 2600, Newark, NJ 07102www.3bstaffing.com Disclaimer: 3B staffing LLC provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. We especially invite women, minorities, veterans, and individuals with disabilities to apply. EEO/AA/M/F/Vet/Disability.
